content: {"name": "Padre Pio Prayer Center Food Distribution (St. Joachim)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "No requirements. First come, first serve. Some people line up outside the church as early as 7:00am for the 10:45am start time.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.piocenter.org/contact", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1527 Church St", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19124", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0118811000791, "longitude": -75.08971092993852}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 288-3081", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:45", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID or proof of income is required."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Residents can pick up supplemental food for their household."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Any resident is eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
